slide.title: Clone
slide.example:
<?php
	class OS {
		var $name;

		function OS($name) {
			$this->name = $name;
		}
	}

	function changeName($obj, $name) {
		$obj->name = $name;
	}

	$linux = new OS('linux');
	$win = $linux->__clone();
	changeName($win, 'windows');
	echo $linux->name. "\n";
	echo $win->name;
	
? >
